mapper.insert: insert into customertbl(cno, rating, name, gender, birth, resident_registration_no, address, mobile, id, password, passhint, email, withdrawal_limits, check_card) values(seq_customer.nextVal, #{rating}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{birth}, #{resident_registration_no},#{address}, #{mobile}, #{id}, #{password}, #{passhint}, #{email}, #{withdrawal_limits}, #{check_card})
